data.text: @CBCEyeopener I appreciated the salon owner's comments. (Apologies for not catching his name.) Last week I paid $60 for a pre-protocol change haircut. I couldn't get a cut & colour before March 1. The salon left $200+ on the table. I have cardiac issues, so will find a new salon.

@CBCEyeopener This was delightful. I don't believe the GOA has provided a framework at all. I do agree that thinking people will manage what lies ahead. Too bad the comment about CERB worked it's way in. Then again, that explains the mask burning party. 😷
